---
name: nasa-automation
description: Access NASA public APIs for space data
---

# NASA Automation

Access publicly available NASA data including images, Mars rover photos, and asteroid tracking.

## Features

- Astronomy Picture of the Day
- Mars Rover photo galleries
- Near Earth Object tracking
- NASA image library search

## Usage

Ask Claude to explore NASA data:
- "Show me today's astronomy picture"
- "Get the latest Mars rover photos"
- "List near-earth asteroids this week"
